announcement_subtitle: Programme highlights, speakers, tickets, and how to secure your place
new_year_message: Happy New Year to all members of the airshow community. Here’s to a safe, successful, and inspiring season ahead.
welcome_text: We’re delighted to invite you to Athens for the European Airshow Council Convention, taking place 25–27 February 2026. Set beneath the Acropolis, EAC26 brings together the European airshow community to connect, learn, and shape the future of our industry.

why_attend.title: Safety & Standards
why_attend.text: Best practice, risk management, and regulatory updates.

why_attend.title: Networking
why_attend.text: Connect with organisers, performers, suppliers, and decision-makers.

why_attend.title: Industry Development
why_attend.text: Leadership, culture, and the future of flying displays.

what_to_expect: Exhibitors showcasing airshow-related services and products
Awards & recognition celebrating excellence across the industry

Wednesday 25 Feb: Safety workshops: Military Fast Jet (invitation only), Flying Display Directors, Formation Pilots, Sustainability
Thursday 26 Feb: Full day of presentations, workshops & exhibitions
EAC Airshow Gala Dinner, Awards & Prize Draw (evening)

host_city: Athens is where history meets modern energy. From the Acropolis and Plaka to rooftop dining and vibrant nightlife, it’s an ideal setting for both focused discussion and memorable downtime. Many delegates choose to extend their stay and enjoy Athens as a short city break.
travel_to_athens: By air: Athens International Airport (ATH) with direct Metro, express buses, and taxis
By sea: Piraeus Port offers easy island connections
Getting around: a modern Metro, tram, and bus network makes moving around straightforward
Check entry requirements for Greece in advance
hotel_blurb: Royal Olympic Hotel (★★★★★) is located next to the Temple of Zeus and beneath the Acropolis. The hotel offers an iconic roof-garden restaurant and a central base for the convention and for delegates extending their stay.
opening_video_text: Our partners PlanesTV will produce the official Convention Opening Video, celebrating the best of European air displays from 2025. Members can submit short clips for inclusion (submission guidance and upload links are provided in the app).
